name: Planet Bike 10mm x 80cm Double-End Cable
description: A double-end cable for use with a U-lock or padlock. Helps improve the odds that the only person quickly releasing your quick-release wheels will be you.2 looped/swaged ends accept a U-lock or padlock.Dimensions are 10mm x 80cm.To secure an expensive bike, or any bike in a public, high-risk area, we recommend a strong U-lock or a combination U-lock and cable lock.
